OUTLINE : This randomize , open label , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord center , primary tumor category ( cT3 cT4 ) , localization tumor ( upper third include cardia II III v middle lower third ) , gender , histological subtype ( intestinal v nonintestinal ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive cisplatin IV 1 hour day 1 , 15 , 29 . Patients also receive leucovorin calcium IV 2 hour follow fluorouracil IV 24 hour day 1 , 8 , 15 , 22 , 29 , 36 . A second course administer begin 2 week later absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients undergo resection lymphadenectomy day 57-63 second course chemotherapy . - Arm II : Patients undergo resection lymphadenectomy within 14 day randomization . Quality life assess randomization , every 3 month 1 year 2 year randomization . Patients follow every 3 month 1 year , every 6 month 2 year , every 3 month thereafter death . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 360 patient ( 180 per arm ) accrue study 4 year .
